body.p:
To the Governor of Ky
To Your Honor

Sir You will see the name of James Drury and Thomas W. Dyer was elected Justices of the Peace we give it as our oppinion that neither of them Should be commissioned owing to their disloyal acts they have both had Sons in the Rebell Army Drury furnishing his Son with a Horse to go and has been active in the rebel cause since the Rebelion began and the reason Drury was elected was no one would run against or offer for the office Dyer lives in a Rebel District & he is a Rebel

J P Jolly Clk B, C, C
G. W Beard S B C
E R Eskridge P J B C C

Please find Certificates of Election
May 7th 1863
J P Jolly
